mapper.select: select ac.ID id, ac.TITLE title, ac.SUMMARY summary, ac.CONTENT content, ac.START_TIME startTime, ac.END_TIME endTime, ac.CREATE_TIME createTime, ac.UPDATE_TIME updateTime, ac.ACTIVITY_IMG activityImg, ac.VIEW_COUNT viewCount, ac.JOIN_COUNT joinCount, cl.CLUB_NAME clubName, ac.SPONSOR_ID sponsorId from `activity` ac left join club cl on cl.id = ac.CLUB_ID where ac.IS_DELETE = 0 and ac.ID = #{id}
SELECT cl.id id, cl.CLUB_NAME clubName, cl.CLUB_IMG clubImg,cl.CREATE_TIME createTime,cl.CLUB_CREATOR creator,u.NAME name from `club` cl left join `user` u on u.id = cl.LEADER_ID where cl.`STATUS` =1

SELECT cl.CLUB_NAME clubName, cl.CLUB_IMG clubImg,cl.CREATE_TIME createTime,cl.CLUB_CREATOR creator,u.NAME name,cl.CLUB_INTRODUCE introduce,cl.CLUB_DESC des from `club` cl left join `user` u on u.id = cl.LEADER_ID where cl.`STATUS` =1 and cl.id = #{id}
select *from `user` where 1 = 1 and STATUS = 0 and id = #{id}
